item.title: About Crypto Earnings
item.description: We help content creators monetize their websites using cryptocurrency advertising networks. Our guides are based on real experience and current market data.

item.title: How to Earn $300/Month with A-Ads
item.description:
Step 1: Sign Up

  1. Visit A-Ads.com
  2. Create account with email/BTC address

Step 2: Create Ad Unit

  1. Click “New Advertisement”
  2. Choose “Website Banner”
  3. Select 300x250 size
  4. Copy the provided code

Step 3: Implementation

  1. Add the code to your website
  2. Wait for approval
  3. Monitor earnings daily

item.title: Ad Test
item.description:
This is the description of what the code block changes:
It looks like the test page is now being built correctly without the theme wrapping! Let's verify the full setup by creating a new content file and adding Netlify configuration:
1. Create a content file to use the adtest layout
2. Add Netlify configuration for proper routing
